snippet: It was my privilege to witness the shower of stars at New-Haven, on the 11th of November, 1833, dejournal of Science." That was a scene of novelty, grandeur and beauty, such as is seldom witnessed in a lifetime....
lead_paragraph: It was my privilege to witness the shower of stars at New-Haven, on the 11th of November, 1833, dejournal of Science." That was a scene of novelty, grandeur and beauty, such as is seldom witnessed in a lifetime.

headline.main: Splendid Atmospheric Phenomenon,--Aufora Totalis.; From The New-York Evangalist.
